00040 CMPIObjectPath* _makePath_LANEndpoint(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00041                                       const CMPIContext *ctx,
00042                                       const CMPIObjectPath *cop,
00043                                       const struct LANEndpoint *LANEP,
00044                                       CMPIStatus *rc)
00045 {
00046     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makePath_LANEndpoint() called"));
00047 
00048     CMPIObjectPath *op = NULL; // ObjectPath to return.
00049 
00050     // The sblim-cmpi-base package offers some tool methods to get common
00051     // system datas
00052     // CIM_HOST_NAME contains the unique hostname of the local system
00053     if(!get_system_name()) {
00054         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00055                              "no host name found");
00056         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makePath_NextHopIPRoute() failed: %s",
00057                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00058         goto out;
00059     }
00060 
00061     op = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop,rc)),
00062                          _ClassName, rc);
00063     if(CMIsNullObject(op)) {
00064         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00065                              "Create CMPIObjectPath failed.");
00066         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makePath_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00067                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00068         goto out;
00069     }
00070 
00071     CMAddKey(op, "Name", LANEP->name, CMPI_chars);
00072     CMAddKey(op, "CreationClassName", LANEP->creationClassName, CMPI_chars);
00073     CMAddKey(op, "SystemCreationClassName", CSCreationClassName,
00074              CMPI_chars);
00075     CMAddKey(op, "SystemName", LANEP->systemName, CMPI_chars);
00076 
00077  out:
00078     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makePath_LANEndpoint() exited"));
00079     return op;
00080 }

00083 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084 CMPIInstance* _makeInst_LANEndpoint(const CMPIBroker *_broker,
00085                                     const CMPIContext *ctx,
00086                                     const CMPIObjectPath *cop,
00087                                     const char **properties,
00088                                     const struct LANEndpoint *LANEP,
00089                                     CMPIStatus *rc)
00090 {
00091     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() called"));
00092 
00093     CMPIObjectPath  *op         = NULL; // Instance op.
00094     CMPIInstance    *ci         = NULL; // Instance to return.
00095     const char     **keys       = NULL; // Keys of the instances.
00096     int              keyCount   = 0;    // Temporary counter.
00097     unsigned short   status     = 2;    // Enabled.
00098     CMPIArray       *opstatus   = NULL; // OperationalStatus.
00099     CMPIArray       *statusDesc = NULL; // StatusDescriptions.
00100     CMPIArray       *groupAddr  = NULL; // GroupAddresses.
00101     CMPIArray       *aliasAddr  = NULL; // AliasAddresses.
00102     CMPIArray       *avalRS     = NULL; // AvailableRequestedStates.
00103 
00104     // The sblim-cmpi-base package offers some tool methods to get common
00105     // system datas
00106     // CIM_HOST_NAME contains the unique hostname of the local system
00107     if(!get_system_name()) {
00108         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00109                              "no host name found");
00110         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00111                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00112         goto out;
00113     }
00114 
00115     op = CMNewObjectPath(_broker, CMGetCharPtr(CMGetNameSpace(cop,rc)),
00116                          _ClassName, rc);
00117     if(CMIsNullObject(op)) {
00118         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00119                              "Create CMPIObjectPath failed.");
00120         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00121                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00122         goto out;
00123     }
00124 
00125     ci = CMNewInstance(_broker, op, rc);
00126     if(CMIsNullObject(ci)) {
00127         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00128                              "Create CMPIInstance failed.");
00129         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00130                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00131         goto out;
00132     }
00133 
00134     // Set property filter.
00135     keys = calloc(5, sizeof(char*));
00136     keys[0] = strdup("Name");
00137     keys[1] = strdup("CreationClassName");
00138     keys[2] = strdup("SystemCreationClassName");
00139     keys[3] = strdup("SystemName");
00140     keys[4] = NULL;
00141     CMSetPropertyFilter(ci, properties, keys);
00142     for( ; keys[keyCount]!=NULL ; keyCount++) {
00143         free((char*)keys[keyCount]);
00144     }
00145     FREE_SAFE(keys);
00146 
00147     aliasAddr = CMNewArray(_broker, 1, CMPI_chars, rc);
00148     if(aliasAddr == NULL) {
00149         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00150                              "Could not create AliasAddresses CMPIArray." );
00151         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00152                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00153         goto out;
00154     } else {
00155         CMSetArrayElementAt(aliasAddr, 0, LANEP->aliasAddresses,
00156                             CMPI_chars);
00157         CMSetProperty(ci, "AliasAddresses",
00158                       (CMPIValue*)&(aliasAddr), CMPI_charsA);
00159     }
00160 
00161     avalRS = CMNewArray(_broker, ARRAY_SIZE(LANEP->availReqStates), CMPI_uint16, rc);
00162     if(avalRS == NULL) {
00163         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00164                              "Could not create AvailableRequestedStates CMPIArray." );
00165         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00166                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00167         goto out;
00168     } else {
00169         int i;
00170         for(i=0 ; i<ARRAY_SIZE(LANEP->availReqStates) ; i++) {
00171             CMSetArrayElementAt(avalRS, i,
00172                                 (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->availReqStates[i]),
00173                                 CMPI_uint16);
00174         }
00175         CMSetProperty(ci, "AvailableRequestedStates",
00176                       (CMPIValue*)&(avalRS), CMPI_uint16A);
00177     }
00178 
00179     CMSetProperty(ci, "Caption", LANEP->caption, CMPI_chars);
00180     CMSetProperty(ci, "CommunicationStatus",
00181                   (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->communicationStatus), CMPI_uint16);
00182     CMSetProperty(ci, "CreationClassName", LANEP->creationClassName,
00183                   CMPI_chars);
00184     CMSetProperty(ci, "Description", LANEP->description, CMPI_chars);
00185     CMSetProperty(ci, "DetailedStatus", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->detailedStatus),
00186                   CMPI_uint16);
00187     CMSetProperty(ci, "ElementName", LANEP->elementName, CMPI_chars);
00188     CMSetProperty(ci, "EnabledDefault", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->enabledDefault),
00189                   CMPI_uint16);
00190     CMSetProperty(ci, "EnabledState", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->enabledState),
00191                   CMPI_uint16);
00192 
00193     groupAddr = CMNewArray(_broker, 1, CMPI_chars, rc);
00194     if(groupAddr == NULL) {
00195         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00196                              "Could not create GroupAddresses CMPIArray." );
00197         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00198                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00199         goto out;
00200     } else {
00201         CMSetArrayElementAt(groupAddr, 0, LANEP->groupAddresses,
00202                             CMPI_chars);
00203         CMSetProperty(ci, "GroupAddresses",
00204                       (CMPIValue*)&(groupAddr), CMPI_charsA);
00205     }
00206 
00207     CMSetProperty(ci, "HealthState", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->healthState),
00208                   CMPI_uint16);
00209     // @todo how can obtain installation date form a device?
00210     // CMSetProperty(ci, "InstallDate", LANEP->, );
00211     CMSetProperty(ci, "InstanceID", LANEP->instanceID, CMPI_chars);
00212     CMSetProperty(ci, "LANID", LANEP->lanID, CMPI_chars);
00213     CMSetProperty(ci, "MACAddress", LANEP->macAddress, CMPI_chars);
00214     CMSetProperty(ci, "MaxDataSize", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->maxDataSize),
00215                   CMPI_uint32);
00216     CMSetProperty(ci, "Name", LANEP->name, CMPI_chars);
00217     CMSetProperty(ci, "NameFormat", LANEP->nameFormat, CMPI_chars);
00218     CMSetProperty(ci, "OperatingStatus",
00219                   (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->operatingStatus), CMPI_uint16);
00220 
00221     opstatus = CMNewArray(_broker, 1, CMPI_uint16, rc);
00222     if(opstatus == NULL) {
00223         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00224                              "Could not create OperationalStatus CMPIArray." );
00225         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00226                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00227         goto out;
00228     } else {
00229         CMSetArrayElementAt(opstatus, 0,
00230                             (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->operationalStatus),
00231                             CMPI_uint16);
00232         CMSetProperty(ci, "OperationalStatus",
00233                       (CMPIValue*)&(opstatus), CMPI_uint16A);
00234     }
00235 
00236     CMSetProperty(ci, "OtherEnabledState", LANEP->otherEnabledState,
00237                   CMPI_chars);
00238     CMSetProperty(ci, "OtherTypeDescription", LANEP->otherTypeDescription,
00239                   CMPI_chars);
00240     CMSetProperty(ci, "PrimaryStatus", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->primaryStatus),
00241                   CMPI_uint16);
00242     CMSetProperty(ci, "ProtocolIFType", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->protocolIFType),
00243                   CMPI_uint16);
00244     CMSetProperty(ci, "RequestedState", (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->requestedState),
00245                   CMPI_uint16);
00246 
00247     statusDesc = CMNewArray(_broker, 1, CMPI_chars, rc);
00248     if(statusDesc == NULL) {
00249         CMSetStatusWithChars(_broker, rc, CMPI_RC_ERR_FAILED,
00250                              "Could not create StatusDescriptions CMPIArray." );
00251         _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() failed: %s",
00252                           CMGetCharPtr(rc->msg)));
00253         goto out;
00254     } else {
00255         CMSetArrayElementAt(statusDesc, 0, LANEP->statusDescriptions,
00256                             CMPI_chars);
00257         CMSetProperty(ci, "StatusDescriptions",
00258                       (CMPIValue*)&(statusDesc), CMPI_charsA);
00259     }
00260 
00261     CMSetProperty(ci, "SystemCreationClassName", CSCreationClassName,
00262                   CMPI_chars);
00263     CMSetProperty(ci, "SystemName", LANEP->systemName, CMPI_chars);
00264     // @todo How can obtain device last change?.
00265     // CMSetProperty(ci, "TimeOfLastStateChange", LANEP->, );
00266     CMSetProperty(ci, "TransitioningToState",
00267                   (CMPIValue*)&(LANEP->transitioningToState), CMPI_uint16);
00268 
00269  out:
00270     _OSBASE_TRACE(2, ("--- _makeInst_LANEndpoint() exited"));
00271     return ci;
00272 }
